scripts.port:who: powershell -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 5174 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 5 -Property LocalPort,State,OwningProcess | Format-Table -AutoSize; $p = (Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 5174 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty OwningProcess); if($p){ Write-Host 'Process:'; Get-Process -Id $p | Select-Object Id,ProcessName,Path } else { Write-Host 'No process bound.' }"
scripts.port:free: powershell -Command "$conns = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 5174 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.OwningProcess -gt 0 }; if(!$conns){ Write-Host 'Port already free'; exit 0 }; $processIds = $conns | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique; foreach($processId in $processIds){ try { $proc = Get-Process -Id $processId -ErrorAction Stop; if($proc.ProcessName -eq 'node'){ Write-Host 'Stopping node PID' $processId; Stop-Process -Id $processId -Force } else { Write-Host 'Skip PID' $processId '->' $proc.ProcessName } } catch { Write-Host 'Cannot access PID' $processId } }"
